arabic.title: أول مرة
text: اول مرة تعجبني حاجة كده وماخدهاش
اول مرة تعجبني حاجة كده وماخدهاش
انا ايه جرالي موقف غريب اوي محطوط فيه
ده تشوفه ماتعدلش عليه صعب اوي تنساه
وهموت لو تضيع مني انا هموت
اول ما عينه تيجي كده في عينيا
دي طريقة كده واسلوب بيعرف يكسبني
وهموت لو تضيع مني انا حموت
دا انت بصراحه صعب تفوت عليه تعدي كده عادي
وهمووت لو تضيـع مني انا همـوت

english.title: The first time
text: It's the first time that I can't take what I like
and I run around in circles and it's still unreachable
what's happened to me with you?
It's the first time that I can't take what I like
and I run around in circles and it's still unreachable
what's happened to me with you?
What's happened to me? it's a very strange situation that I'm in
if you see her, you can't look away, it's very hard to forget her
and I'd die if I lose you, I'd die
she knows how to win me with her own way
she can take me away from a hundred different things
I wish I could live with her
and I'd die if I lose you, I'd die
and I'd die if I lose you, I'd die

arabic.title: الفرح
text: أنا من النهارد ده حبيبي ليك
أنا مش مصدق نفسي و الله
من يوم ما جات عيني في عينيك
و أنا حاسس إني ح أبقا ليك

english.title: happpines
text: this night i wont sleep we'll melt and passion will steal us
and we'll live my heart a beautifull nights
from today i will be yours come closer make me feel you
this night is better than thousned night
i can't believe myslef i swear
every beat in my heart is melting in your love
the days of our life is coming we'll melt my heart in every second
aha with the days with you
aha what good from you love
form today my hole life will be with you
you know baby how much i have been dreaming of that day
i lived waiting night and nights
since my eyes came to your eyes
i felt that i will be for you
i will live my life with you your most precious
i can't believe myslef i swear
every beat in my heart is melting in your love
the days of our life is coming we'll melt my heart in every second
aha with the days with you
aha what good from you love
form today my hole life will be with you
i can't believe myslef i swear
every beat in my heart is melting in your love
the days of our life is coming we'll melt my heart in every second
aha with the days with you
aha what good from you love
form today my hole life will be with you

english.title: Forget about me and keep away
text: Forget about me, and keep away
It may be good for you
Breaking up maybe good for us
Isn't that better than finding us..
That I have never wronged you
I did't notice that I was lost
I was happy that I crushed into you
But I was shocked of you!
Not to make myself tired and sick
I hope you are now pleased
That we don't think of the past
Now I no longer get upset, finally it's normal
I will forget about you oneday
Your way is opposite to mine
as you have been cruel too much
Leave me, I mean good bye

english.title: Forget about me and stay away
text: Forget about me and stay away
maybe parting is what's best for us
isn't it better than finding ourselves
and remember, before you walk away
that there wasn't a day where I put pressure on you
I didn't realize that I was lost
I was happy with my hastiness
because I don't want to suffer
I found out, and I'm learning
I hope that you're fine like this
let's not think about the past
and I'm not upset, it's all good now
I will forget about you in the end
you're going in the opposite direction
as much as you were cruel

english.title: Bahtaglek
text: i need you and you forget me ,you don't separate from me even for one day
my love come back to me again my longing is melting ine me
your image doesn't leave my fantasy i always see you in front of me
my love come back to me again if i'm still precious to you
if i tell you what happend to me and tell you about the nights
i'm sleepless and the longing is burning me while you don't know about me
if i tell you what happend to me and tell you about the nights
i'm sleepless and the longing is burning me while you don't know about me
i need you and you forget me ,you don't separate from me even for one day
my love come back to me again if i'm still precious to you
i gave up in you but i love you my life
i don't forget you my beloved even if i waste my life away from you
your image doesn't leave my fantasy i always see you in front of me
my love come back to me again if i'm still precious to you
if i tell you what happend to me and tell you about the nights
i'm sleepless and the longing is burning me while you don't know about me
if i tell you what happend to me and tell you about the nights
i'm sleepless and the longing is burning me while you don't know about me
i need you and you forget me ,you don't separate from me even for one day
my love come back to me again if i'm still precious to you
if i tell you what happend to me and tell you about the nights
i'm sleepless and the longing is burning me while you don't know about me
if i tell you what happend to me and tell you about the nights
i'm sleepless and the longing is burning me while you don't know about me
i need you and you forget me ,you don't separate from me even for one day
my love come back to me again if i'm still precious to you

arabic.title: حياتى
text: حياتي في بعدى عنك مش حياة
ده أنا بعد منك قولت آه
هو أنا ما بجيش على بالك؟

english.title: My life
text: My life without you is not even a life
After you came, I said, ah
I miss your embraces; what am I going to do?
My situation was hard on everyone and the nights complained
Do I never cross your mind?
Or do you enjoy seeing me suffer?
Reassure me with a word, my love
Comfort my heart that is calling out for you
My love, I thought I can handle this torture
But guess what? As you're away, I loved you even more
Understand how i'm feeling and take me back, make me yours, and bring me back
Your eyes are the only place I belong in
Do I never cross your mind?
Or do you enjoy seeing me suffer?
Reassure me with a word, my love
Comfort my heart that is calling out for you

english.title: don't i come on your mind - my life
text: my life away from you is not life
and nights are nagging from me
don't i come to your mind
relief me with a word, dear
relief my heart which called you
My love, i said i can endure the pain
but imagine that i loved you more
come and feel me, take to you, get me back to whom i am
there's no place in life other than your eyes
don't i come to your mind
relief me with a word, dear
relief my heart which called you
my life away from you is not life
and nights are nagging from me
don't i come to your mind
relief me with a word, dear
relief my heart which called you

english.title: my life
text: my life when i'm away from you is not a life
i miss your arms what can i do
my suitation is hard for everybody and nights complained about me
every day i ask my questions
i don't come to your mind
make me stop worring baby in one word
comfort my heart that's calling you
baby i said i can handel th torture
but imagen when i was away i loved you more
come feel me take me to you bring myself bake
without your have i have no place in this world
i don't come to your mind
make me stop worring baby in one word
comfort my heart that's calling you (x3)

arabic.title: سكت
text: كلام ايه اللى بيه هوصف هواك؟
ده أنا من أول يوم فى حياتى

english.title: Saket
text: I am silent because theres nothing, you don't love anymore
its enough that I am going to live and die with you
Forgive me if infront of you
I forgot or became silent, about words to describe your love
I live in this world to live for you
All of the words in the world is not enough for you
I have been thinking of you from the first day in my life
In your arms I live the best nights of my life
You made me forget life when I am in your hands
You didnt escape from my mind for a second, your in my mind even when you away
I sleep and wake up for your love

arabic.title: سهران
text: و لو يا حبيبي غالى عليك
و تقول على قلبى انه نسيك؟

english.title: Sahran
text: Im wakeful in nights … im calling you ,you who forgot me
Im confused about you , for what you are keeping my eyes busy!
Darling ,im still waiting for you … you left me ,and still I dream of you
If im precious to you …isn’t enough for farness !
why you disappear? And then you say that my heart forgot you
You moved away for years and my soul was with you …. I tired too much to forget you
But darling ,my heart called you ….isn’t enough for farness!
I love you however you moved away …. And your love is increasing every day
And my heart is burning by your fire … isn’t enough for farness!
why you disappear? And then you say that my heart forgot you

arabic.title: صدقيهم
text: انتى فاكرة ان الجراح بعدك قليله؟
باقية منك جوه منى حاجات كتيرة
كل ماسمع عنك انتي اي سيرة

english.title: Belive Them
text: Belive them if they tell you that i am not living my life, belive them if they tell you that i am suffering and silent
Every girl I met I find you in her , and I miss your eyes
I used to love my life and your love filed it and my eyes were asking for you daily
You think that the hurt you caused isnt a big deal, or you being away from me iis easy, that wound makes me suffer every night but I don't want to show it
Your still inside of me, no matter how long u've been away
Every time I hear anything about you, I cry about my unfortunate luck

arabic.title: عادي
text: معاك لو حتى طال بعدك سنة

english.title: Normal
text: It's normal if a day you ,if you felt bad, I will forgive you
It's normal I will get over my sadness, even I wont ask you why
Come and tell me that you miss me, my love I miss you, I told you it before
Even if you left me for a year, I wont forget our love, are you thinking about that
Are you afraid or what, are you embarrassed or is there a situation, I wish to know whats wrong with you
So many days have gone by while I can't sleep, and you don't even care
No matter how long your absent you will be always close to, my heart didnt change
My eyes sees you even if your away, my soul is still with you, you left but its okay
Come closer to hug me, don't you love me, and I am sure you've missed me
Stop being upset, come lets live we will die just to meet, this is unfair.

arabic.title: قمت بالواجب
text: هو كان في حد لاقي الحب ده

english.title: You've Done the Job
text: By the way I was content
with whatever you'd do to me
Could someone find a love like this?
and did the job very well
Why wouldn't you once be considerate
And with you my heart was
even when we are far away
And it didn't care about the distance
as long as it is with you
But you treated me with such ungratefulness
As if you were someone who never existed
It's like you're happy to do this at those times
And you sold me out and that's what's strange
The disaster is that it was all willfully on my part
And it wasn't enough for me
I hurt my self-worth as I stood before you
And all that was supposed to be for you
If any one was in your place

english.title: Now you're missing me?
text: Now you're missing me, you're dying to see me, and are dying without me?
Where was your longing when I loved you?
Now you're missing me, you're dying to see me, and are dying without me?
Where was your longing when I loved you?
Or do you only know the value of what you have after losing it
You only appreciate it when it's away, and now you want to get back together?
You're late, you can't make me love you again
Or do you only know the value of what you have after losing it
You only appreciate it when it's away, and now you want to get back together?
You're late, you can't make me love you again
